name: GrandeurSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room light”
”Alexa, turn on the fan”
”Alexa, turn down the bedroom air conditioning temperature”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Dear Grandeur Smart users, congratulations, you can now use alexa to control your smart home devices. 

Just say "alexa, turn on the bedroom light" and you can turn on the light called "bedroom light" integrated in Grandeur Smart. 

Try it!
